name: Sneaky Beats
description:
Sneak through each level, avoiding the patrolling guards to reach your goal!

Hack computers & locked doors using the power of your rhythm. If you're sneaky enough you might be able to knock a guard out from behind but be careful, it won't end well if they catch you!

Controls: (Controller recommended)

Keyboard Controls:
Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
Interact - H/J/K/L
Controller Controls:
Move - Left Stick
Interact - A/B/X/Y
